entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries at times heavy or rain showers. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Rain showers beginning early this evening then changing to flurries at times heavy later this evening and ending this evening. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High plus 5.
